mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CUSTOMER (customerCode, tel, email, userName, birth) VALUES (#{customerCode}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{userName}, #{birth})
INSERT INTO MEMBER(customerCode, userId, userPwd, enabled, membershipCode, membershipDate) VALUES (#{customerCode}, #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{enabled}, #{membershipCode}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET last_login = SYSDATE WHERE userId=#{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT m1.customerCode, userId, userName, userPwd, enabled, created_date, last_login ,TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth, email, tel, m2.membershipCode, disCount, membershipName, TO_CHAR(membershipDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') membershipDate FROM CUSTOMER m1 JOIN member m2 ON m1.customerCode = m2.customerCode JOIN membershipinfo m3 ON m2.membershipCode = m3.membershipCode WHERE userId = #{userId}
